sqlMap.insert:
insert into t_department (
departid
departcode
departname
departlevel
parentdepartid
departfullcode
nodeorder
isleaf
departsimplepin
departallpin
departbrevitycode
) values (
#departid#
#departcode#
#departname#
#departlevel#
#parentdepartid#
#departfullcode#
#nodeorder#
#isleaf#
#departsimplepin#
#departallpin#
#departbrevitycode#
)
sqlMap.update:
update t_department a set departid=departid
departcode=#departcode#
departname=#departname#
departlevel=#departlevel#
parentdepartid=#parentdepartid#
departfullcode=#departfullcode#
nodeorder=#nodeorder#
isleaf=#isleaf#
departsimplepin=#departsimplepin#
departallpin=#departallpin#
departbrevitycode=#departbrevitycode#
where 1=1
sqlMap.delete: delete from t_department where departfullcode like '$departfullcode$%'
sqlMap.select:
select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from (select a.departid departid,a.departcode departcode,a.departname departname, a.departlevel departlevel,a.parentdepartid parentdepartid, a.departfullcode departfullcode,a.nodeorder nodeorder, a.isleaf isleaf,a.departsimplepin departsimplepin,a.departallpin departallpin, a.departbrevitycode departbrevitycode, nvl(b.departname,'顶级') parentdepartname , (case when (select count(1) from t_user t1 where t1.departid in (select departid from t_department t2 where t2.departfullcode like trim(a.departfullcode) || '%' )) + (select count(1) from t_role t1 where t1.departid in (select departid from t_department t2 where t2.departfullcode like trim(a.departfullcode) || '%' )) >0 then 1 else 0 end) child_count from t_department a ,(select t.departid,t.departname from t_department t) b where 1=1 and a.parentdepartid=b.departid(+)
(upper(a.departsimplepin) like upper('$query_simplepin$')||'%' or lower(a.departallpin) like lower('$query_simplepin$')||'%' or a.departcode like '$query_simplepin$%' or a.departname like '%$query_simplepin$%')
a.departcode like '$deptCode$%'
order by $pageSort$ ) z) x where rowno >$beginRow$ and rowno <= $endRow$

select count(1) a from t_department a ,(select t.departid,t.departname from t_department t) b where 1=1 and a.parentdepartid=b.departid(+)
(upper(a.departsimplepin) like upper('$query_simplepin$')||'%' or lower(a.departallpin) like lower('$query_simplepin$')||'%' or a.departcode like '$query_simplepin$%' or a.departname like '%$query_simplepin$%')
a.departcode like '$deptCode$%'

select a.departid departid,a.departcode departcode,a.departname departname,a.departlevel departlevel,a.parentdepartid parentdepartid,a.departfullcode departfullcode,a.nodeorder nodeorder,a.isleaf isleaf,a.departsimplepin departsimplepin,a.departallpin departallpin,a.departbrevitycode departbrevitycode from t_department a where 1=1
a.departcode like 'CJD%'
length(a.departcode) =#length#
(upper(a.departsimplepin) like upper('$query_simplepin$')||'%' or lower(a.departallpin) like lower('$query_simplepin$')||'%' or a.departcode like '$query_simplepin$%' or a.departname like '%$query_simplepin$%')
a.departcode like '$deptCode$%'
a.parentdepartid=#parentdepartid#
order by a.departcode

select a.departid departid,a.departcode departcode,a.departname departname,a.departlevel departlevel,a.parentdepartid parentdepartid,a.departfullcode departfullcode,a.nodeorder nodeorder,a.isleaf isleaf,a.departsimplepin departsimplepin,a.departallpin departallpin,a.departbrevitycode departbrevitycode from t_department a where a.departcode not like 'CJD%' and a.departcode not like 'ZJD%' and a.departcode not like 'qyd%' and a.departcode <> '111' and length(a.departcode)=12 order by a.departcode

select a.departid departid,a.departcode departcode,a.departname departname, a.departlevel departlevel,a.parentdepartid parentdepartid,a.departfullcode departfullcode, a.nodeorder nodeorder,a.isleaf isleaf,a.departsimplepin departsimplepin, a.departallpin departallpin,a.departbrevitycode departbrevitycode, nvl(b.departname,'顶级') parentdepartname,(case when (select count(1) from t_user t1 where t1.departid in (select departid from t_department t2 where t2.departfullcode like trim(a.departfullcode) || '%' )) + (select count(1) from t_role t1 where t1.departid in (select departid from t_department t2 where t2.departfullcode like trim(a.departfullcode) || '%' )) >0 then 1 else 0 end) child_count from t_department a ,(select t.departid,t.departname from t_department t) b where a.parentdepartid=b.departid(+)
order by a.departid

select a.departid departid,a.departcode departcode,a.departname departname,a.departlevel departlevel,a.parentdepartid parentdepartid,a.departfullcode departfullcode,a.nodeorder nodeorder,a.isleaf isleaf,a.departsimplepin departsimplepin,a.departallpin departallpin,a.departbrevitycode departbrevitycode from t_department a where a.parentdepartid = #departid#
departcode in ($departfullcode$) and parentdepartid != 0
a.departlevel<=#departlevel#
order by nodeorder

select a.departid departid,a.departcode departcode,a.departname departname,a.departlevel departlevel,a.parentdepartid parentdepartid,a.departfullcode departfullcode,a.nodeorder nodeorder,a.isleaf isleaf,a.departsimplepin departsimplepin,a.departallpin departallpin,a.departbrevitycode departbrevitycode from t_department a where a.departid= #parentdepartid#

select a.departid departid,a.departcode departcode,a.departname departname,a.departlevel departlevel,a.parentdepartid parentdepartid,a.departfullcode departfullcode,a.nodeorder nodeorder,a.isleaf isleaf,a.departsimplepin departsimplepin,a.departallpin departallpin,a.departbrevitycode departbrevitycode from t_department a where 1=1
departCode like '%CJD%' and departCode != 'CJD32' and departLevel=4
departCode like '32%' and departLevel=4 and departCode not like '32__00'
departCode like '32%' and departLevel=5
departCode like '32__00' and departCode!='3200'
departCode like #departcode# and departCode not like '32__00' and departLevel=4
length(departcode) ='12' and departLevel=4
length(departcode) ='12' and departLevel=5
length(departcode) ='12' and departLevel=3
parentDepartID=#hndeptId#
parentDepartID =1
departCode like '$departcode$%'
departId = #departid#
order by nodeorder

select a.departid departid,a.departcode departcode,a.departname departname,a.departlevel departlevel,a.parentdepartid parentdepartid,a.departfullcode departfullcode,a.nodeorder nodeorder,a.isleaf isleaf,a.departsimplepin departsimplepin,a.departallpin departallpin,a.departbrevitycode departbrevitycode from t_department a where departfullcode like '%$departfullcode$%' and departid<>#departid#
a.departlevel=4
order by nodeorder

select a.departid departid,a.departcode departcode,a.departname departname,a.departlevel departlevel,a.parentdepartid parentdepartid,a.departfullcode departfullcode,a.nodeorder nodeorder,a.isleaf isleaf,a.departsimplepin departsimplepin,a.departallpin departallpin,a.departbrevitycode departbrevitycode from t_department a where departcode in ($departfullcode$) and parentdepartid <> 0
order by departlevel

select a.departid departid,a.departcode departcode,a.departname departname,a.departlevel departlevel,a.parentdepartid parentdepartid,a.departfullcode departfullcode,a.nodeorder nodeorder,a.isleaf isleaf,a.departsimplepin departsimplepin,a.departallpin departallpin,a.departbrevitycode departbrevitycode from t_department a where parentdepartid = #departid#
substr(a.departCode,0,4) in(select substr(t.gxdwbm,0,4) from t_ylcsjbxx t where t.gxdwbm like CONCAT(substr(a.departCode,0,4),'%'))
substr(a.departCode,0,6) in(select substr(t.gxdwbm,0,6) from t_ylcsjbxx t where substr(t.gxdwbm,0,6) = substr(a.departCode,0,6))
a.departCode in(select t.gxdwbm from t_ylcsjbxx t where t.gxdwbm = a.departCode)
order by nodeorder
select count(1) from t_department where parentdepartid = #parentdepartid#

select nvl((max(a.nodeorder)+1),0) nodeorder from t_department a where 1=1
a.parentdepartid = #parentdepartid#

select a.departid departid,a.departcode departcode,a.departname departname,a.departlevel departlevel,a.parentdepartid parentdepartid,a.departfullcode departfullcode,a.nodeorder nodeorder,a.isleaf isleaf,a.departsimplepin departsimplepin,a.departallpin departallpin,a.departbrevitycode departbrevitycode from t_department a where 1=1
a.departcode like '$deptCode$%'
a.departcode like '$departcode$%'
a.departid <> #departid#
a.parentdepartid <> #parentdepartid#
order by a.departcode
